Introductory Notes and Course¶

MATLAB Notes and Course is a set of notes and an introductory MATLAB course designed for new users.

MFE Companion Course¶

The companion course is designed to accompany Financial Econometrics I and II and to provide tools needed in Empirical Asset pricing.

MFE Toolbox¶

The MFE Toolbox provides a large collection of MATLAB functions for analyzing financial time series.
